description: William B. Taylor Jr., the top U.S. diplomat in Ukraine, and George P. Kent, a senior State Department official in charge of Ukraine policy, are testifying in front of the House Intelligence Committee in the first public hearing of the impeachment inquiry. Our correspondents are following every revelation and providing live analysis and insights.
title: Full Video and Analysis of Day 1 of Impeachment Hearing Testimony
title_page: Full Video and Analysis of Day 1 of Impeachment Hearing Testimony - The New York Times
maintext: I’m popping back in to remind readers that there will be another impeachment hearing on Friday, with Marie L. Yovanovitch, the former American ambassador to Ukraine. Then next week — on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday — the committee will hear from eight more witnesses. Be sure to follow our coverage.
